blocks.name: cfa
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include the factorial of nonnegative integers.
blocks.origin: const class cfa { ! }

blocks.name: diff.cfa.s
diff.cfa.c
diff.cfa.w
df-fac
blocks.content: Define the factorial function on nonnegative integers. For example, ` ( ! `` 5 ) = 1 2 0 ` because ` 1 x. 2 x. 3 x. 4 x. 5 = 1 2 0 ` ( ~ ex-fac ). In the literature, the factorial function is written as a postscript exclamation point. (Contributed by NM, 2-Dec-2004.)

blocks.name: facnn
blocks.content: Value of the factorial function for positive integers. (Contributed by NM, 2-Dec-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jul-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm facnn(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(cfa, c0), cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), c0)))
} = {
  eleq2s(c0, cn, cdif(cn0, csn(nat0)), wceq(cfv(cfa, c0), cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), c0)))
  fvsnun2(cfa, c0, cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), nat0, universe, nat1, universe, cn0, wcel(c0, cdif(cn0, csn(nat0))))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cdif(cn0, csn(nat0))), wcel(nat0, universe))
  c0ex()
  a1i(wcel(c0, cdif(cn0, csn(nat0))), wcel(nat1, universe))
  1ex()
  eqtr4i(cfa, cun(csn(cop(nat0, nat1)), cres(cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), cdif(cn0, csn(nat0)))), cun(csn(cop(nat0, nat1)), cseq(nat1, cmul, cid)))
  df-fac()
  uneq2i(csn(cop(nat0, nat1)), cres(cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), cdif(cn0, csn(nat0))), cseq(nat1, cmul, cid))
  eqtr3i(cres(cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), cdif(cn0, csn(nat0))), cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), cres(cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), cfv(cuz, nat1)))
  reseq2i(cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), cfv(cuz, nat1), cdif(cn0, csn(nat0)))
  eqtr3i(cfv(cuz, nat1), cdif(cn0, csn(nat0)), cn)
  nnuz()
  mp2b(wceq(cres(cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), cfv(cuz, nat1)), cseq(nat1, cmul, cid)), wcel(nat1, cz), wfn(cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), cfv(cuz, nat1)))
  1z()
  seqfn(nat1, cmul, cid)
  fnresdm(cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), cfv(cuz, nat1))
  id(wcel(c0, cdif(cn0, csn(nat0))))
  dfn2()
}

blocks.name: fac0
blocks.content: The factorial of 0. (Contributed by NM, 2-Dec-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jul-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm fac0() {
  |- wceq(cfv(cfa, nat0), nat1)
} = {
  mptru(wceq(cfv(cfa, nat0), nat1))
  fvsnun1(cfa, nat0, nat1, universe, universe, cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), cn0, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wcel(nat0, universe))
  c0ex()
  a1i(wtru, wcel(nat1, universe))
  1ex()
  eqtr4i(cfa, cun(csn(cop(nat0, nat1)), cres(cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), cdif(cn0, csn(nat0)))), cun(csn(cop(nat0, nat1)), cseq(nat1, cmul, cid)))
  df-fac()
  uneq2i(csn(cop(nat0, nat1)), cres(cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), cdif(cn0, csn(nat0))), cseq(nat1, cmul, cid))
  eqtr3i(cres(cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), cdif(cn0, csn(nat0))), cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), cres(cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), cfv(cuz, nat1)))
  reseq2i(cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), cfv(cuz, nat1), cdif(cn0, csn(nat0)))
  eqtr3i(cfv(cuz, nat1), cdif(cn0, csn(nat0)), cn)
  nnuz()
  dfn2()
  mp2b(wceq(cres(cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), cfv(cuz, nat1)), cseq(nat1, cmul, cid)), wcel(nat1, cz), wfn(cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), cfv(cuz, nat1)))
  1z()
  seqfn(nat1, cmul, cid)
  fnresdm(cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), cfv(cuz, nat1))
}

blocks.name: facp1
blocks.content: The factorial of a successor. (Contributed by NM, 2-Dec-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jul-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm facp1(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(cfv(cfa, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(cfa, c0), cmul, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))
} = {
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(cfv(cfa, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(cfa, c0), cmul, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wo(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(c0, nat0)))
  elnn0(c0)
  jaoi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(cfv(cfa, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(cfa, c0), cmul, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))
  eqtrd(cfv(cfa, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(cfa, c0), cmul, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wcel(c0, cn))
  syl(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(cfa, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cn))
  peano2nn(c0)
  facnn(co(c0, caddc, nat1))
  3eqtr4a(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), co(c0, caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(cfa, c0), cmul, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), c0), cmul, cfv(cid, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), co(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), c0), cmul, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wcel(c0, cn))
  oveq2i(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), c0), cmul, cfv(cid, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), co(c0, caddc, nat1))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cid, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), universe))
  ovex(c0, caddc, nat1)
  fvi(co(c0, caddc, nat1), universe)
  eleq2s(c0, cn, cfv(cuz, nat1), wceq(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), co(c0, caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), c0), cmul, cfv(cid, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))))
  seqp1(c0, nat1, cmul, cid)
  nnuz()
  oveq1d(cfv(cfa, c0), cmul, co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, cid), c0), wcel(c0, cn))
  facnn(c0)
  3eqtr4a(cfv(cfa, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(cfa, c0), cmul, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cfv(cfa, co(nat0, caddc, nat1)), nat1, wceq(c0, nat0))
  eqtri(cfv(cfa, co(nat0, caddc, nat1)), nat1, cfv(cfa, nat1))
  fveq2i(cfa, co(nat0, caddc, nat1), nat1)
  fac1()
  fvoveq1(c0, nat0, cfa, caddc, nat1)
  syl6eq(co(cfv(cfa, c0), cmul, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), nat1, co(cfv(cfa, nat0), cmul, co(nat0, caddc, nat1)), wceq(c0, nat0))
  oveq12d(cfv(cfa, c0), cmul, co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfv(cfa, nat0), co(nat0, caddc, nat1), wceq(c0, nat0))
  fveq2(c0, nat0, cfa)
  oveq1(c0, nat0, caddc, nat1)
  eqtri(co(cfv(cfa, nat0), cmul, co(nat0, caddc, nat1)), nat1, co(nat1, cmul, nat1))
  oveq12i(cfv(cfa, nat0), cmul, co(nat0, caddc, nat1), nat1, nat1)
  fac0()
  0p1e1()
  1t1e1()
}

blocks.name: fac2
blocks.content: The factorial of 2. (Contributed by NM, 17-Mar-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm fac2() {
  |- wceq(cfv(cfa, nat2), nat2)
} = {
  eqtri(cfv(cfa, nat2), nat2, cfv(cfa, co(nat1, caddc, nat1)))
  fveq2i(cfa, nat2, co(nat1, caddc, nat1))
  df-2()
  eqtri(cfv(cfa, co(nat1, caddc, nat1)), nat2, co(cfv(cfa, nat1), cmul, co(nat1, caddc, nat1)))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cfa, co(nat1, caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(cfa, nat1), cmul, co(nat1, caddc, nat1))), wcel(nat1, cn0))
  1nn0()
  facp1(nat1)
  eqtri(co(cfv(cfa, nat1), cmul, co(nat1, caddc, nat1)), nat2, co(nat1, cmul, nat2))
  oveq12i(cfv(cfa, nat1), cmul, co(nat1, caddc, nat1), nat1, nat2)
  fac1()
  1p1e2()
  mulid2i(nat2)
  2cn()
}

blocks.name: fac3
blocks.content: The factorial of 3. (Contributed by NM, 17-Mar-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm fac3() {
  |- wceq(cfv(cfa, nat3), nat6)
} = {
  3eqtri(cfv(cfa, nat3), nat6, cfv(cfa, co(nat2, caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(cfa, nat2), cmul, co(nat2, caddc, nat1)))
  fveq2i(cfa, nat3, co(nat2, caddc, nat1))
  df-3()
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cfa, co(nat2, caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(cfa, nat2), cmul, co(nat2, caddc, nat1))), wcel(nat2, cn0))
  2nn0()
  facp1(nat2)
  3eqtri(co(cfv(cfa, nat2), cmul, co(nat2, caddc, nat1)), nat6, co(nat2, cmul, nat3), co(nat3, cmul, nat2))
  oveq12i(cfv(cfa, nat2), cmul, co(nat2, caddc, nat1), nat2, nat3)
  fac2()
  2p1e3()
  mulcomi(nat2, nat3)
  2cn()
  3cn()
  3t2e6()
}

blocks.name: fac4
blocks.content: The factorial of 4. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fac4() {
  |- wceq(cfv(cfa, nat4), cdc(nat2, nat4))
} = {
  3eqtr3i(cfv(cfa, nat4), cdc(nat2, nat4), cfv(cfa, co(nat3, caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(cfa, nat3), cmul, co(nat3, caddc, nat1)))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cfa, co(nat3, caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(cfa, nat3), cmul, co(nat3, caddc, nat1))), wcel(nat3, cn0))
  3nn0()
  facp1(nat3)
  fveq2i(cfa, co(nat3, caddc, nat1), nat4)
  eqtri(co(cfv(cfa, nat3), cmul, co(nat3, caddc, nat1)), cdc(nat2, nat4), co(nat6, cmul, nat4))
  oveq12i(cfv(cfa, nat3), cmul, co(nat3, caddc, nat1), nat6, nat4)
  fac3()
  3p1e4()
  6t4e24()
}

blocks.name: facnn2
blocks.content: Value of the factorial function expressed recursively. (Contributed by NM, 2-Dec-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm facnn2(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(cfa, c0), co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cmul, c0)))
} = {
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(cfa, c0), co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cmul, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cn0)))
  elnnnn0(c0)
  3eqtr3d(cfv(cfa, c0), co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cmul, c0), cfv(cfa, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cn0)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cn0), wceq(cfv(cfa, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1))))
  facp1(co(c0, cmin, nat1))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cn0), wceq(cfv(cfa, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1)), cfv(cfa, c0)))
  fveq2d(cfa, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), c0, wcel(c0, cc))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cn0), wceq(co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cmul, c0)))
  oveq2d(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), c0, wcel(c0, cc))
  npcan1(c0)
}

blocks.name: faccl
blocks.content: Closure of the factorial function. (Contributed by NM, 2-Dec-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm faccl(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(cfv(cfa, c0), cn))
} = {
  nn0ind(hs0, hs1, c0, wcel(cfv(cfa, c0), cn), wcel(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(cfv(cfa, nat0), cn), wcel(cfv(cfa, cv(hs1)), cn), wcel(cfv(cfa, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cn))
  eleq1d(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)), cn, cfv(cfa, nat0), wceq(cv(hs0), nat0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), nat0, cfa)
  eleq1d(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)), cn, cfv(cfa, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cfa)
  eleq1d(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)), cn, cfv(cfa, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cfa)
  eleq1d(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)), cn, cfv(cfa, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cfa)
  eqeltri(cfv(cfa, nat0), cn, nat1)
  fac0()
  1nn()
  expcom(wcel(cv(hs1), cn0), wcel(cfv(cfa, cv(hs1)), cn), wcel(cfv(cfa, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cn))
  eqeltrd(cfv(cfa, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cn, co(cfv(cfa, cv(hs1)), cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), wa(wcel(cfv(cfa, cv(hs1)), cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cn0)))
  adantl(wcel(cfv(cfa, cv(hs1)), cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cn0), wceq(cfv(cfa, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(cfa, cv(hs1)), cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))))
  facp1(cv(hs1))
  sylan2(wcel(cfv(cfa, cv(hs1)), cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cn0), wcel(co(cfv(cfa, cv(hs1)), cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cn), wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cn))
  nn0p1nn(cv(hs1))
  nnmulcl(cfv(cfa, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cfv(cfa, c0), cn))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cfv(cfa, nat0), cn))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cfv(cfa, cv(hs1)), cn))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cfv(cfa, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cn))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)), cn))
}

thm faccl(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚Üí(! ` c0)‚àà ‚Ñï)
} = {
  nn0ind(hs0, hs1, c0, (! ` c0)‚àà ‚Ñï, (! ` hs0)‚àà ‚Ñï, (! ` 0)‚àà ‚Ñï, (! ` hs1)‚àà ‚Ñï, (! `(hs1[+]1))‚àà ‚Ñï)
  eleq1d((! ` hs0), cn, (! ` 0), hs0 = 0)
  fveq2(hs0, nat0, cfa)
  eleq1d((! ` hs0), cn, (! ` hs1), hs0 = hs1)
  fveq2(hs0, hs1, cfa)
  eleq1d((! ` hs0), cn, (! `(hs1[+]1)), hs0 =(hs1[+]1))
  fveq2(hs0, (hs1[+]1), cfa)
  eleq1d((! ` hs0), cn, (! ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cfa)
  eqeltri((! ` 0), cn, nat1)
  fac0()
  1nn()
  expcom(hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, (! ` hs1)‚àà ‚Ñï, (! `(hs1[+]1))‚àà ‚Ñï)
  eqeltrd((! `(hs1[+]1)), cn, ((! ` hs1)[√ó](hs1[+]1)), ((! ` hs1)‚àà ‚Ñï ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï0))
  adantl((! ` hs1)‚àà ‚Ñï, hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, (! `(hs1[+]1))=((! ` hs1)[√ó](hs1[+]1)))
  facp1(hs1)
  sylan2((! ` hs1)‚àà ‚Ñï, hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, ((! ` hs1)[√ó](hs1[+]1))‚àà ‚Ñï, (hs1[+]1)‚àà ‚Ñï)
  nn0p1nn(hs1)
  nnmulcl((! ` hs1), (hs1[+]1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((! ` c0)‚àà ‚Ñï)
  diff.hs0.w((! ` 0)‚àà ‚Ñï)
  diff.hs0.w((! ` hs1)‚àà ‚Ñï)
  diff.hs0.w((! `(hs1[+]1))‚àà ‚Ñï)
  diff.hs1.w((! ` hs0)‚àà ‚Ñï)
}

blocks.name: faccld
blocks.content: Closure of the factorial function, deduction version of ~ faccl . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)

blocks.name: facmapnn
blocks.content: The factorial function restricted to positive integers is a mapping from the positive integers to the positive integers. (Contributed by AV, 8-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: facne0
blocks.content: The factorial function is nonzero. (Contributed by NM, 26-Apr-2005.)

blocks.name: facdiv
blocks.content: A positive integer divides the factorial of an equal or larger number. (Contributed by NM, 2-May-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm facdiv(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn), wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wcel(co(cfv(cfa, c0), cdiv, c1), cn))
} = {
  3imp(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wcel(co(cfv(cfa, c0), cdiv, c1), cn))
  nn0ind(hs0, hs1, c0, wi(wcel(c1, cn), wi(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wcel(co(cfv(cfa, c0), cdiv, c1), cn))), wi(wcel(c1, cn), wi(wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)), wcel(co(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)), cdiv, c1), cn))), wi(wcel(c1, cn), wi(wbr(c1, cle, nat0), wcel(co(cfv(cfa, nat0), cdiv, c1), cn))), wi(wcel(c1, cn), wi(wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs1)), wcel(co(cfv(cfa, cv(hs1)), cdiv, c1), cn))), wi(wcel(c1, cn), wi(wbr(c1, cle, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), wcel(co(cfv(cfa, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cdiv, c1), cn))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), nat0), wcel(c1, cn), wi(wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)), wcel(co(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)), cdiv, c1), cn)), wi(wbr(c1, cle, nat0), wcel(co(cfv(cfa, nat0), cdiv, c1), cn)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), nat0), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)), wcel(co(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)), cdiv, c1), cn), wbr(c1, cle, nat0), wcel(co(cfv(cfa, nat0), cdiv, c1), cn))
  breq2(cv(hs0), nat0, c1, cle)
  eleq1d(co(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)), cdiv, c1), cn, co(cfv(cfa, nat0), cdiv, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), nat0))
  oveq1d(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)), cdiv, c1, cfv(cfa, nat0), wceq(cv(hs0), nat0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), nat0, cfa)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(c1, cn), wi(wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)), wcel(co(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)), cdiv, c1), cn)), wi(wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs1)), wcel(co(cfv(cfa, cv(hs1)), cdiv, c1), cn)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)), wcel(co(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)), cdiv, c1), cn), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs1)), wcel(co(cfv(cfa, cv(hs1)), cdiv, c1), cn))
  breq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c1, cle)
  eleq1d(co(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)), cdiv, c1), cn, co(cfv(cfa, cv(hs1)), cdiv, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))

blocks.name: facubnd
blocks.content: An upper bound for the factorial function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Apr-2016.)
